Package io.micronaut.management.endpoint.loggers.impl

Class LogbackLoggingSystem

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.management.endpoint.loggers.impl.LogbackLoggingSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
LoggingSystem, ManagedLoggingSystem
@Singleton @Requires(beans=LoggersEndpoint.class) @Requires(classes=ch.qos.logback.classic.LoggerContext.class) @Replaces(LogbackLoggingSystem.class) public class LogbackLoggingSystem extends Object implements ManagedLoggingSystem, LoggingSystem
An implementation of ManagedLoggingSystem that works with logback.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Moss
